name: Ring of Obscuring
entries: This band of iron resembles a skull and is cold to the touch. It has 3 charges and regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn. As an action while wearing the ring, you can expend 1 of its charges to cast the {@spell fog cloud} spell from it, with the following changes: the cloud is centered on you when it first appears, and the spell lasts for 1 minute (no concentration required).
